andromeda.why: Refuses panic coercion; keeps consent sovereign in the first shock of crisis.

arcturus.why: Stabilizes turbulence—sets de-escalation, pacing, and safe container before acting.

draco.why: Predators exploit confusion and rank chaos to seize control.

lyra.why: Not an aesthetic/authorship axis; this is crisis hygiene.

orion-dark.why: Weaponizes emergency to force obedience and restrict movement.

orion-light.why: Honorable restraint—hold position and courage until the right response is clear.

pleiades.why: Attuned soothing and emotional triage prevent overwhelm in the group.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching crisis hygiene; no formal instruction yet.

andromeda.why: Declines forced disclosure/performances of calm—maintains sovereignty.

arcturus.why: Implements de-escalation protocol—rhythm, boundaries, and contact rules.

draco.why: Loyalty tests under stress (‘prove you’re with us’).

lyra.why: Composed tone/phrasing lowers ambient panic so plans can land.

orion-dark.why: Etiquette-as-control to suppress real signals from the field.

orion-light.why: Discipline of restraint—move only when timing is true.

pleiades.why: Relational pacing and gentle holding regulate the room.

sirius.why: Crisis handling without codified teaching yet.

andromeda.why: Reclaims choice after reactive swings; refuses coercive panic scripts.

draco.why: Predatory opportunism: dominate through fear spikes.

orion-dark.why: Narrative control—using crisis stories to tighten hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction—admit missteps, reset stance, engage cleanly.

pleiades.why: Appeasement/enmeshment to keep peace at the cost of truth.

sirius.why: Self-forging under pressure; no transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Advocates consent and clear truth amidst panic narratives.

arcturus.why: Translates field chaos into usable protocol—triage, roles, comms.

draco.why: Guards perimeter and deters predation when the field is weak.

lyra.why: Composed bearing and clear cadence calm the crowd.

orion-dark.why: ‘One right way’ orthodoxy risks suppressing real signals.

pleiades.why: Humane soothing and safe contact keep the system regulated.

sirius.why: Crisis protocol teaching—lawful response via clear frames and example.

andromeda.why: Resists panic propaganda used to herd or control the masses.

arcturus.why: Projected as universal fixer → burnout/scapegoat when refusing bad plans.

draco.why: Gatekeeping access to safety/resources as status theater.

lyra.why: Iconic calm without theatrics; presence steadies the field.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—hold steady to the true response, not applause.

pleiades.why: Appeasing demands to ‘keep the peace’ undermines sound action.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: ethical crisis leadership despite pressure.

andromeda.why: Liberates communities from chronic panic cycles; chooses truth over fear.

arcturus.why: Elder standards for readiness/recovery—exercises, reviews, after-action learning.

draco.why: Legacy rank rigidity can cling to permanent ‘emergency powers.’

lyra.why: Quiet dignity becomes a cultural signal for steadiness.

orion-dark.why: Canonizing emergency hierarchy over living intelligence.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—acts (or refuses to act) with impeccable timing and courage.

pleiades.why: Focus is standards of response, not bonding/soothing at this altitude.

sirius.why: Crisis sage—teaches the law of right response by embodied example.
